actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969 to prohibit the export of horses from the United States for purposes of slaughter.

summary.text: Amends the Export Administration Act of 1969 to prohibit the exportation from the United States of any horse by vessel after December 31, 1976, unless exported under waivers provided under regulations promulgated by the Secretary of Commerce, in consultation with the Secretary of Agriculture, which permit special consignments of not more than ten horses and which are in conformance with human standards. Prohibits transatlantic exportation by vessel of horses intended for slaughter. Prohibits exportation of horses by vessel from November 1 to March 31 inclusive.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969 to prohibit the export of horses from the United States for purposes of slaughter.
